TopicTitle: Mod management for different career saves

Articles.Content: I'm not entirely new to KSP but I would really like a mod management system for different career saves so you can run multiple careers with different mods enabled, basically a system to enable or disable any mod in game.

A very common suggestion/request.

As far as I know, no. On availability, execution as well as possibility.
But you could make separate KSP installs (you can have as many as you like) and mod each of them differently.

Theoretically it would be possible. Some plugins (like life support) can switch themselves off on certain saves. I'm surprised that CKAN hasn't implemented something like that yet (not that I use it).
In my travels here I've stumbled upon a mod that actually does this but it is for a pretty old version, I searched for 10-15 minutes but can't find it It can be done tho
